title: arturo s√°nchez-porras
text:
Experienced environmental sciences researcher and (learning new things everyday) data scientist. I mainly work with R but also have experience with GIS software.
When not working on a project, I enjoy playing videogames, reading and cycling in the city.






currently working on



Currently working on a CONACYT-funded project about the relation between pollution in the Atoyac Basin and its impacts on health
